name: Afghani Namkeen Boti Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Afghani Namkeen Boti Recipe: Mutton(boneless) 500 grams Fat 250 grams Crushed Black Pepper 1 tsp Garlic Paste 1 tbsp Papaya Paste ½ cup Cinnamon Powder ½ tsp Oil 2 tbsp Lahori Salt to taste
instructions: First take 250 grams of fat cut into small cubes. Take a mixing bowl add 500 grams of mutton , fat cubes , 1 tsp of crushed black pepper Add 1 tbsp of garlic paste, ½ tsp of cinnamon powder and a pinch of lahori salt Add ½ cup of papaya paste mix it and marinate for 2 hours. Now skewer the mutton and fat now bake it for nicely golden brown or steam at coals and fry in a fry pan. At last take it out in a serving dish and serve it with chapati.
